text: Hey All. Great conversation on search, and happy that everyone is thinking about this. We are currently working on building a native search module here at HubSpot. It’s still in early stages, but as we get closer we’ll definitely share more information about it.
<@U2SJA29B4> - Mind DM’ing me the name of your CAM? I just want to be sure they’re aware.
good to hear. dm sent. thx.
<@U22PU4G4A> may I mention that this is in progress for a blog post we’re writing about the shut down of Google’s paid (ad free) site search?
obviously no time frame (end of month) would be suggested (guaranteed) :slightly_smiling_face:
Yeah, you can mention it’s in progress.

hi all, We're trying to implement service workers on HubSpot and need to be able to add the sw.js file to the root of the domain (it has to be in the root). Is this humanly possible on the cos platform?

Hey team. I am having an issue with an AdRoll script not displaying on inline Thank You messages when I use the form module. It seems to work fine if we embed the forms as code, but not with the form module. Has anyone experienced this?
There is a console error that states, "portalId=2327453&hsFormKey=a6b3594…&submissionGuid=433b3130-6b4f-4b68-ae48…:53 GET <http://a.adroll.com/j/roundtrip.js> net::ERR_BLOCKED_BY_CLIENT"
Meanwhile, I have other HS clients that this code loads just fine using form modules.
